headline: Q4 Earnings Roundup: Enviri (NYSE:NVRI) And The Rest Of The Waste Management Segment
summary: Quarterly earnings results are a good time to check in on a company’s progress, especially compared to its peers in the same sector. Today we are looking at Enviri (NYSE:NVRI) and the best and worst performers in the waste management industry.
